attributes.action: Save Elizabeth Hall in Exmouth for community use
attributes.additional_details:
Our aim is to save Elizabeth Hall, in Exmouth, for the community and restore it to its former glory.

This petition has been prompted by the residents of Exmouth who are angry that the council could just close the hall by selling it to a developer.

This site has been placed on the open market earlier than expected with possible future uses include a hotel, residential units or for commercial use.
